name: Blency
description:
Blency is a top-down shooter created for the 44th Ludum Dare with the theme "Your life is currency" by three students at the Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia (IIM) [Romain HABIB, Sebastien GUAROBER and Paul LEDUC].

In this game, you have to survive to some waves of zombies and you only have a gun to defend yourself. You regain life over time and have the opportunity to buy a speed boost with your life points. There is also two puddles of blood placed on the map to win life faster.
